tool_description: An API to get information about anime characters. Your encyclopedia of anime characters..
name: Animepedia
title: Animepedia

api_list.name: Search character
api_list.description: Search for Characters: The search endpoint allows you to search for anime characters. You can specify your search query by adding a q parameter to the URL. For example, if you want to search for "Goku", the URL will look like this: /characters/search?q=goku
